name: Sydney Opera House
notes: Main concert hall, requires special approval for lasers

name: Rod Laver Arena
notes: Large sport and entertainment venue, good for arena shows

name: Brisbane Convention Centre
notes: Multiple halls available, Hall 1 is largest

name: Perth Arena
notes: Modern venue with retractable roof, good for larger shows

name: Enmore Theatre
notes: Art deco theater, good for medium-sized shows

name: Fortitude Music Hall
notes: Newest venue in Brisbane, modern facilities

name: TSB Arena
notes: Waterfront location, good for medium-large shows

name: Hordern Pavilion
notes: Large open floor space, good for dance events
